title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository providing a lightweight, extensible framework for running large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama, enabling programmatic chat, generate, embed, pull, push, create, list, copy and delete operations.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama with browser and Node.js support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama models as LLM and chat components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama supporting chat, model management, RAG, multimodal vision and voice.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java library for Ollama providing synchronous/asynchronous APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced command-line tool for Ollama with interactive chat, model search and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local AI code completion via Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration allowing Ollama models as generators and embedders for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for common Ollama use cases: PDF chat, function calling, fine-tuning, etc.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app example consuming Ollama’s streaming API.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-use Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama with WebUI, Open WebUI, or LangChain services.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama supporting threaded replies and model switching.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds AI-assisted writing and summarization using Ollama models.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama and common models for reproducible deployments.
